column4: ] BreliC[: i would take him to task if i were you. nmap her box, see whats running, also run netstat on it and see what it thinks is running.
thanks.  i will run some checks on her machine.  would chkrootkit help at all in this case?
yeah, that's what i was thinking of doing.  problem is, she lives in another city and they won't reconnect her machine until she "brings it in" or so he says
heh, it already is, but like i said, they disconnected her, so i can't get in
